de.esoco.ewt.impl.gwt

Interface WidgetStyleHandler


  • public interface WidgetStyleHandler
    An interface for the global handling of widget style updates. Registered with Component.setWidgetStyleHandler(WidgetStyleHandler).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyWidgetStyle(Component rComponent, StyleData rStyle)
      Will be invoked to apply a new style to a component widget.

    • Method Detail

      • applyWidgetStyle

        void applyWidgetStyle(Component rComponent,
                      StyleData rStyle)
        Will be invoked to apply a new style to a component widget.
        Parameters:
        rComponent - rWidget The component
        rStyle - The new style
